definition: to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit

sentences.english: The bridge collapsed, so we had to wade across the river.
sentences.chinese: 因为桥梁倒塌，所以我们必须涉水过河。

sentences.english: China, to beat my old drum, is not going to collapse or implode.
sentences.chinese: 请容许我重申我的意见，中国是不会倒塌或内爆的。

sentences.english: It is not clear how many survived the collapse of the three-storey building.
sentences.chinese: 倒塌的三层楼下还有多少幸存者目前还不得而知。

sentences.english: The old church collapsed after the heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 大雨之后，那座老教堂倒塌了。

sentences.english: The rescue team moved on to the next collapsed building.
sentences.chinese: 营救队进入到下一个倒塌的建筑物。

sentences.english: The fall of the belin wall marked the dawn of new era in European history.
sentences.chinese: 柏林墙的倒塌，标志着欧洲新历史的到来。

sentences.english: His mine collapsed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 但他的矿井再一次事故中倒塌。

sentences.english: Prolonged pressure caused the sternum to snap in half and the ribs to break.
sentences.chinese: 大型瓦斯罐由于受到爆震波的压挤破裂倒塌了。

sentences.english: The old building fell down in the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那栋旧楼在暴风雨中倒塌了。

sentences.english: Only then could the cement wall collapse in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 在当时，正是这一点注定了柏林墙的倒塌。

sentences.english: A collapsed home in Sukagawa city, in the northern part of the country.
sentences.chinese: 须贺川市村子北部倒塌的家。

sentences.english: The oil station collapsed due to heavy snows.
sentences.chinese: 整个油站因抵受不住重重的积雪而倒塌。

sentences.english: Right now, several houses collapsed, but no casualties reported.
sentences.chinese: 目前，造成数间房屋倒塌，但尚无伤亡情况报道。

sentences.english: Most of houses in the city were smashed in after earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 地震之后城里的大部分房屋都倒塌了。

sentences.english: The old church fell down last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月这间老教堂倒塌了。

sentences.english: The library crashed to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆轰隆一声倒塌了。

definition: to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
talus slide/to crumble (of scree slope)/to collapse/landslide
to level/to raze to the ground
loudly/with a loud bang/a loud rumble
